definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Baby giant pandas spend a lot of time drinking their mum's milk.
sentences.chinese: 小熊猫花费大量的时间喝他们妈妈的奶水。

sentences.english: Do not know enough milk or the baby has a problem.
sentences.chinese: 不知道是奶水不够呢还是宝宝有问题。

sentences.english: Mother dog's milk was not enough, eigher. so mother goat came to nurse baby tiger.
sentences.chinese: 狗妈妈奶水不够，羊妈妈又来给小虎娃喂奶。

sentences.english: while calves are separated from them, and never drink enough milk.
sentences.chinese: 小牛被迫和母亲分离，永远也得不到足够的奶水。

sentences.english: In the first 8 weeks of the new born cubs, they depend entirely on mother's milk.
sentences.chinese: 在最初的8个星期中，虎仔们全靠妈妈的奶水生活。

sentences.english: One day, Betsy has no milk.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，贝琪没有奶水了。

sentences.english: This result can provide morphology reference for nourish milk bubalus of Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果为培育广西奶水牛提供形态学依据。

sentences.english: If I now eat more fat milk soup, milk will increase.
sentences.chinese: 如果我现在多吃些发奶的汤，奶水是否会增加。

sentences.english: The fermentation of milk causes it to curdle.

definition: to suckle/to pump breast milk with a breast pump
to promote lactation/to stimulate lactation (e.g. with drug)
milk from a woman's breast/milk (used in the names of dishes to indicate white sauce)
